overview: When a group of girl dancers discover boys on the new dating app Swiperr they hold a party for them all before they begin rehearsals for a dance competition and inadvertently let a murderer into their midst. Unbeknown to the group the psychopath and one of the girls has a dark past. One by one the girls disappear and the kidnapper/murderer leaves only dead crows and cryptic clues in their place. The remaining girls must fight to unravel the clues and escape the murderer before itâ€™s too late.
title: Swiperight
